blogPost.excerpt: Gemini 2 detects duplicate and similar files in every corner of your Mac, including Photos, Music, and even external drives. And helps you free up tons of disk space. Plus, now it spots new copies right away so that they won’t pile up again.
blogPost.body: Gemini 2 detects duplicate and similar files in every corner of your Mac, including Photos, Music, and even external drives. And helps you free up tons of disk space. Plus, now it spots new copies right away so that they won’t pile up again.
blogPost.title: Duplicates Monitor by Gemini 2 - Keep your Mac duplicate-free at all times
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 双子座2可以检测到你Mac的每个角落里的重复和类似文件，包括照片、音乐，甚至是外部驱动器。并帮助你释放大量的磁盘空间。此外，现在它能立即发现新的副本，以免它们再次堆积。
localize.tagline: 让你的 Mac 始终保持无复制状态

localize.description: 雙子座2可以檢測到你Mac的每個角落裏的重複和類似文件，包括照片、音樂，甚至是外部驅動器。並幫助你釋放大量的磁盤空間。此外，現在它能立即發現新的副本，以免它們再次堆積。
localize.tagline: 讓你的 Mac 始終保持無複製狀態

previous.excerpt: Gleek.io is a diagram maker focused on speed ⏱ - typing code is much faster than drag-and-drop - for developers, it is more natural to write than to draw - generate a diagram with connections Create your first diagram in Gleek.io & write your feedback 🙏
previous.title: Gleek - Free online diagramming tool for developers

localize.description: Gleek.io是一个专注于速度的图表制作器 ⏱ - 输入代码比拖拽快得多 - 对于开发者来说，写比画更自然 - 生成一个有连接的图表 在Gleek.io中创建你的第一个图表并写下你的反馈 🙏
localize.tagline: 开发者的免费在线制图工具

localize.description: Gleek.io是一個專注於速度的圖表製作器 ⏱ - 輸入代碼比拖拽快得多 - 對於開發者來說，寫比畫更自然 - 生成一個有連接的圖表 在Gleek.io中創建你的第一個圖表並寫下你的反饋 🙏
localize.tagline: 開發者的免費在線製圖工具

next.excerpt: Automatically transform images 8x their original size without a loss in quality.
next.title: Upscale 2.0 by Sticker Mule - Increase the resolution of any graphic or photo, instantly.

localize.description: 在不损失质量的情况下，自动转换8倍于原始尺寸的图像。
localize.tagline: 瞬间提高任何图形或照片的分辨率。

localize.description: 在不損失質量的情況下，自動轉換8倍於原始尺寸的圖像。
localize.tagline: 瞬間提高任何圖形或照片的分辨率。
